component.name: WriterSolo
component.summary: An extensive desktop app for fully writing a screenplay or convert between various screenplay formats such as final draft fdx or fountain

description.p: NOTICE: THIS WRAPPER IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH UPSTREAM!

If you have issues with the flatpak environment, post an issue on the github repo. Otherwise, please redirect all questions and comments to writerduet themselves
WriterSolo is a free version of WriterDuet that is not synced to any servers.
You get all the same features of WriterDuet, just without collaboration or any connection to an external server
You can seamlessly convert from fdx, to fountain, or even PDF.
For now, will only work with XWayland because it doesn't play nice with native wayland.
